'''2.2.3125''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.3124''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.3123''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on June 10, 2021.

== Changes ==
* Updated main Java Launcher page to Caves & Cliffs image.
* Updated how some buttons work to reduce long localization strings causing UI problems.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-17346}} - News article images momentarily disappear and show their filename when clearing a search or category.
